content: I'm trying to understand use cases. One simple use case is "I know the name of an IG and I want to find its profiles". Is this in-scope for the registry?
that's not a use case we've been thinking about. In principle, if you know the IG, you should find out it's profiles from reading the IG
OK. Is there a set of in-scope use cases?
there was very expansive set written by @Lloyd McKenzie some time ago. I'm sure he can dig them up
the principle use case is 'what are people doing with X'?
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Registry_Requirements is what I think Grahame's referring to. Not use-cases per se.
